constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission: 20/01769/FUL (Erection of single storey, single family dwellinghouse (following demolition of detached garage) with associated landscaping, amenity space, parking, cycle store and refuse enclosureDemolish Detached Garage, Erect One-Bedroom Detached Bungalow, Lay Out Parking Space and Garden, Lay Out Associated Hard and Soft Landscaping, Including New Boundary Treatments, and Construct Cycle Store and Recycling Bin Shelter) dated: 22/09/2020. Changes and alterations to roof design and fenestration to facilitate accommodation in loft space, amendments to internal layout and relocation of cycle store
decision_conditions: The proposed scheme owing to the significant material changes to application 20/01769/FUL would not fall within the scope of a s.73 application.

The proposed development would provide poor quality and cramped accommodation that would harm the living conditions of future occupiers and result in overdevelopment of the application site. The proposals would be contrary to Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy DM10 of the Council's LDF Core Strategy (2012) and the NPPF (2021).
